Uses of Package
structure.matter

Packages that use structure.matter
structure.grid Provides classes for creating and working with Grid object. 
structure.io.pdb Provides classes for reading and writing PDB files. 
structure.math.pdb Provides classes for applying mathematical operations on PDB objects. 
structure.matter Provides classes for representing and handling generic atomic structure in 3D. 
structure.matter.hetgroups Provides classes for representing small atomic structures in 3D based on the HETATM entries in PDB files. 
structure.matter.pdb Provides classes for representing and handling atomic structure of amino acids and polypeptides based on the PDB. 
xwalk.crosslink Provides classes for representing and handling cross-link data. 
xwalk.math Provides classes for mathematical operations on cross-link objects, such as working with distances. 
 

Classes in structure.matter used by structure.grid
Atom
          Class handling all atom fields of a standard PDB file.
AtomList
          A generic class holding important functions for classes that store a list of Atom objects.
 

Classes in structure.matter used by structure.io.pdb
Atom
          Class handling all atom fields of a standard PDB file.
Molecule
          Abstract class representing chemical molecules.
 

Classes in structure.matter used by structure.math.pdb
AtomList
          A generic class holding important functions for classes that store a list of Atom objects.
 

Classes in structure.matter used by structure.matter
Atom
          Class handling all atom fields of a standard PDB file.
AtomList
          A generic class holding important functions for classes that store a list of Atom objects.
Bond
          Class handles chemical bonds between Atom objects.
 

Classes in structure.matter used by structure.matter.hetgroups
AtomList
          A generic class holding important functions for classes that store a list of Atom objects.
Molecule
          Abstract class representing chemical molecules.
